## `pyenv`

> Simple Python version management.

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (CODE:src=pyenv.console) -->
<!-- The below code snippet is automatically added from pyenv.console -->

```console
+ pyenv versions

+ python --version
Python 2.7.16
```
